document.full_text: standard chartered plc  said it had cut 800 jobs this year to restrain rising costs after making record first quarter profits and revenue on the back of strong asian markets like india and hong kong.
document.title: stanchart cuts staff to combat cost pressures
lines_and_colors: standard chartered plc  said it had cut 800 jobs this year to restrain rising costs after making record first quarter profits and revenue on the back of strong asian markets like india and hong kong.
